subject: re:Can't be a lover anymore?
body:
Dear customer.
We are happy to inform you about the start of a huge sale of high-quality GENERIC drugs in our Canadian Web pharmacy. Best pills by licensed manufacturers all at real tiny prices.
Can generic drugs be cheap? Sure, but only if they come from Canada. CanadianPharmacy offers you to save large without having to put your health in danger. Huge choice of qualitative generic drugs offered at the lowest prices imaginable only at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the only Canadian Web pharmacy to be recommended by FDA.
Sincerely yours,Socorro Roland
